name.ja: ジャスティス・ドラゴン

requirement.en: Shuffle 2 Dragon Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
requirement.de: Mische 2 Monster des Typs Drache von deinem Friedhof in das Deck.
requirement.es: Baraja 2 monstruos de Tipo Dragón de tu Cementerio al Deck.
requirement.fr: Mélangez 2 monstres de Type Dragon depuis votre Cimetière dans le Deck.
requirement.it: Mischia 2 mostri di Tipo Drago dal tuo Cimitero nel Deck.
requirement.ja: 自分の墓地のモンスター（ドラゴン族）２体をデッキに戻して発動できる。
requirement.ko: 자신 묘지의 몬스터(드래곤족) 2장을 덱으로 되돌리고 발동할 수 있다.

ja.set_name: Strongest Battle Deck Luke - Dragon's Dragons
Strongest Battle Deck Yuamu - Come Forth! High Tech Dragon!

ko.set_name: Strongest Battle Deck Luke - Dragon's Dragons
Strongest Battle Deck Yuamu - Come Forth! High Tech Dragon!
